short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manually collect and download Facebook post data from Feedspy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LBC Feedspy Post Collector is a powerful tool designed to give you control over the posts you want to analyze. While Feedspy provides the ability to download bulk data, this extension enhances your workflow by enabling you to manually select specific posts for collection and export.

Key Features:

- Manual Post Selection: Collect data only for the posts you choose, giving you precise control over what to analyze.
- Detailed Facebook Post Data: Gather information such as likes, shares, comments, publication time, and more for each selected post.
- Export Options: Easily download your collected data as Excel or JSON files for in-depth analysis and reporting.

Why Use This Extension? 

While Feedspy allows bulk data downloads, it may include unnecessary information. This extension focuses on giving you the ability to:

- Hand-pick specific posts you want to analyze.
- Avoid exporting irrelevant data, saving time and effort.
- Gain flexibility in curating data for targeted analysis.

How It Works:

- Install the extension and pin it to your browser toolbar.
- Open Feedspy and navigate to the Facebook posts you want to analyze.
- Click Start Post Collection to begin gathering data.
- Click the Collect Post button next to each post.
- Once youâ€™re done, export your collected data as an Excel or JSON file.

Privacy Assurance: This extension does not collect or share any personal user data. All collected data remains securely stored locally on your device.
